sense.name: come up with (a plan, idea, etc., by mental effort)
sense.examples: She devised a method to electronically restore Piero della Francesca's painting. PTI has devised a comprehensive plan of action if something prevents staff from physically going to work. She devised a control system to guide her business operations that became a standard in the design field.

sense.name: give by will, especially real property
sense.examples: I give and devise to my dear sister, Jane Mecom, a house I have in Boston.
